姫川さん！ 今朝はありがとね！\nあなたのアドバイスのおかげで、課題をクリアでき:
Himekawa-san! Thanks for this morning!
Thanks to your advice, I was able to complete my assignment!
本当？ よかった。\nでも、私は大したことはしてないわよ。:
Really? Thank goodness.
But I didn't do anything special.
泉花～。昨日、代わりに掃除やってくれてサンキュ～！\nホント助かっちゃった～！:
Izumika~ Thanks for cleaning for me yesterday~!
You really saved me!
気にしないで。\n放課後は外せない用事があったんでしょ？:
Don't worry about it.
You had something you couldn't miss after school, right?
クラスの訓練データを整理してくれたのは、あなたね？\nいつも気を利かせてくれてあ:
You're the one who organized the class' training data, aren't you?
Thank you for always being considerate, Himekawa-san.
いえ、私がやらなくても、他の子が手伝ったと思いますよ。: No, even if I hadn't done it, I think the other girls would have helped.
どうかしら。\n誰もがあなたのように優秀な生徒なら、私達も助かるんだけど。:
I don't know.
If everyone was as good a student as you, we'd be saved too.
（本当優等生って感じだな。\nみんなから感謝され、慕われているみたいだ）:
(She really does feel like an honor student.
Everyone seems to be grateful and adored by her.)
（……なんだ、今の妙な顔。気のせいか？）: (...What was that strange look for? Was I imagining things?)
今度、何かお礼するね！: I'll thank you for something next time!
せっかくだし、ちょっと声でもかけて――: Now that I'm here, I might as well call out to her—
おーい、泉花ー！\n落とし物したみたいだぞー！:
Hey, Izumika!
Looks like I lost something!
この手帳、泉花のものだろ？\nえっと……『感謝スケジュール帳』……？:
This notebook belongs to Izumika, doesn't it?
Umm... 'A thank-you schedule book'...?
彼女は素早く近づいてくると、\nさっと謎の手帳を俺の手から取り上げた。:
She quickly approached, and...
She quickly takes the mysterious notebook from my hand.
ちょっといい！？ こっち来て……！！: Can I talk to you for a second?! Come here...!!
いきなり引っ張るなよ。\nどうしたんだ、一体――:
Don't pull on me all of a sudden.
What in the world is going on—
もし見たって言ったら？: What if I told you I saw it?
しゃらぁーっぷ！！ その名前を口にしないで！！\n手帳の中、見たの！？ 見てない:
Sharaaaa!! Don't say that name!!
Did you see it in your notebook?! Did you not see it?!!
もし嘘だったら、記憶を消させてもらうから！！: If it's a lie, I'll erase your memories!!
どんな方法で消すつもりなんだ……: How do you plan to erase it...?
できればこれ以上消さないでほしいんだが。: If possible, I'd prefer it if you didn't erase it any further.
…………そう。なら仕方ないわね。: ............I see. Then there's no helping it.
見てない見てない！\nていうか、その手で持ち上げようとしている椅子はなんだ！？:
I didn't see it. I did not see it!
Wait, what's with that chair you're trying to lift with your hand!?
さすがに冗談よ。\n私だって犯罪者にはなりたくないし。:
I'm joking, of course.
I don't want to be a criminal, either.
……今のは本気の目っぽかったぞ。: ...That was a serious look in her eyes.
とにかく、中を見てないのは本当だ。\n女子の持ち物を勝手に詮索するなんて失礼な真:
Anyway, it's true that I didn't look inside.
She wouldn't be rude to pry into a girl's belongings without permission.
内容はともかく、そんなに人に見られるのが不安なら、\nアナログで持ち歩かなきゃい:
Regardless of the content, if you're that worried about people seeing you,
You don't have to carry it around analog.
むしろデジタルデータの方が怖いじゃない。\nネットの海に流出したら、ずーっと残っ:
If anything, digital data is scarier.
If it's leaked into the sea of the internet, it'll remain forever.
アナログなら、いざって時に簡単に処分できるわ。\nリスクを考えたら、断っ然アナロ:
If it's analog, it'll be easy to get rid of it when the time comes.
Considering the risks, it's definitely analog!
落としたことに気付かないまま中を人に見られて、\n話を広められたら同じことじゃな:
People were staring inside without noticing that I'd dropped it
Wouldn't it be the same if we could spread the story?
し、しまった～っ！\n完全に盲点だったわ！:
C-Crap!
It was a complete blind spot!
と、とにかく！ この手帳のことは、\n絶っっっ対に他言無用よ！ いいわね！？:
A-Anyway! About this notebook...
Don't tell anyone else! Got it!?
……知られた相手が%usernameusernameuserna%さんだったのは:
...The person known as %usernameusernameuserna%-san...
That's a silver lining.
とりあえずお礼は言っておくわ。\n手帳、拾ってくれてありがとう。:
For now, I'll give you my thanks.
Thank you for picking up my notebook.
やっぱり、あの手帳の中身……気になるな。\n泉花のためにも忘れようと思ったが、頭:
I'm still curious about what's in that notebook.
I wanted to forget about it for Izumika's sake, but it was burned into my mind and wouldn't go away.
また落っことして、誰かに見つかってなきゃいいが……\n泉花は思ったより抜けている:
I hope I don't drop it again and someone finds me...
Izumika seems to be missing more than I thought.
（泉花……？\n教室の前に突っ立って、一体どうし――）:
(Izumika...?
Why are you standing in front of the classroom?)
姫川さん、ま～た先生の手伝いしてたんだって？: Himekawa-san, you were helping Sensei again?
教室の中から、話し声が聞こえてくる。: I can hear voices talking from inside the classroom.
いつものポイント稼ぎでしょ。\nあちこちに媚び売って、うざっ。:
It's the usual way to earn points, right?
She's flirting with me all over the place, and it's annoying.
ねー。ほんとムカつく。\nいい子ぶってるのが見え見えの偽善者じゃん。:
Hey. It really pisses me off.
You're an obvious hypocrite who's pretending to be a good girl.
（行ってしまった……\nとりあえず、追いかけよう）:
(He's gone...
Anyway, let's go after her.)
さっきのクラスメイト達の話、聞いてたんだろ。\nその……大丈夫か？:
You were listening to your classmates earlier, weren't you?
Um... Are you okay?
…………はは。\nなんか私、思ってたよりこたえてたみたい。:
............haha.
Looks like I was holding back more than I thought.
なんで言い返さなかったんだ？\nどうとでも反論できただろ、優等生の泉花なら。:
Why didn't you say anything back?
I'm sure I could have refuted that, given that she's an honor student.
優等生、ね。\n優等生がこんなの書いてると思う？:
An honor student, huh?
You think an honor student would write something like this?
これは……昨日の手帳？\n中身、見られたくないんじゃなかったのか？:
Is this... yesterday's notebook?
I thought you didn't want me to see what's inside?
特別に許可してあげる。どのみち、\n%usernameusernameusern:
I'll give you special permission. Either way,
I had a feeling %usernameusernameuserna% would find out sooner or later.
『朝。花瓶の水替え。この花を気に入ってる先生から、５感謝ポイント』: "Morning. Water in a vase. 5 points of gratitude from a teacher who likes these flowers."
『授業後。ついて行けずに困ってる子に教示して、１人３感謝ポイント。\n昼。食堂で:
"After class. I'll teach a girl who's in trouble because she can't keep up, and each person gets three thanks points.
Lunch. Help set the table in the dining hall. 5 points of gratitude...]
『夜。寮の共有部の掃除。管理人から３感謝ポイント。\n休日はボランティア。１０感:
"Night. Cleaning the dorm's common club. Three thanks points from the caretaker.
[Volunteer on days off. 10 points of gratitude ←It's big!]
『はらぐろさくしー！ 私ってば恐ろしい子！』……？: "Haraguro Sakushii! I'm such a scary girl!" ...?
……ま、いいわ。\nこれでわかったでしょ？:
...Well, whatever.
Now you know, don't you?
見ての通り、あの子達の陰口、ぜーんぶ図星だから。\n反論する意味なんてないのよ。:
As you can see, they were right on the mark when they talked behind their backs.
There's no point in arguing.
……私ね、ありがとうって言われるのが好きなの。: ...You know, I like it when people say thank you.
誰かに必要とされてる気がして……\n自分の居場所が『ああ、ここにあるんだ』って思:
I felt like someone needed me...
Because it makes me feel like my place is "Yeah, right here."
何より、人から感謝されるって快感じゃない？: More than anything, isn't it the pleasure of being thanked by others?
見返りがほしくて。もっとありがとうって言われたくて。\nずーっと打算で、みんなに:
I wanted something in return. I wanted to be thanked more.
I've been doing everything in my power to help everyone.
自覚してたから、人から何言われたって平気。: I was aware of it, so it didn't matter what people said.
平気……なつもりだった……けど……: I thought... I was fine... but...
なーんか、いざ言葉にされるとグサってきちゃった。\n私、意外と繊細？:
For some reason, when I put it into words, it makes me groan.
Am I more sensitive than I thought?
……やっぱり、もうやめるべきよね。\n善人ぶって、みんなに尽くすなんてことは。:
...I should probably stop now.
I can't pretend to be a good person and devote myself to everyone.
それってさ……本当に打算だけだったのか？\n今までの泉花の行動全部。:
Was that... really just a calculation?
Everything Izumika's been doing up until now.
ど、どうしたのよ、急に真面目な顔して。: Wh-What's with the serious look all of a sudden?
誰かを助けようとした泉花の気持ちは、全部嘘だったのか？: Was all of Izumika's desire to save someone a lie?
……嘘じゃない、と思う。\n助けたいって全然思えないなら、わざわざ手を貸したりし:
...I don't think it's a lie.
I wouldn't go out of my way to help her if I didn't want to at all.
なら、いいじゃん。\n開き直っちまえよ。:
Then it's fine.
You should be more open about it.
人ってすぐ他人に潔癖であることを求めるけど、\n善行に見返りを求めることの何が悪:
People tend to be fastidious to other people,
What's wrong with asking for something in return for good deeds?
美味しいパンを売ります、\nだからお金をもらいます……これと何が違う？:
I'll sell you delicious bread,
So I'll take the money... What's the difference?
別にお前は犯罪をやってるわけでも、迷惑をかけてるわけでもない。\nむしろみんなの:
It's not like you're committing a crime or causing any trouble.
If anything, I'm doing it for everyone's benefit.
泉花の行動で救われてるやつだって、確かにいるはずだろ。\nだったらその分、お前が:
I'm sure there are people who've been saved by Izumika's actions.
In that case, there's no reason to complain if you benefit from it.
感謝ポイントがどうとか、\n恥ずかしい手帳の中身はこの際置いておくとして――:
Something about gratitude points,
Leaving the contents of my embarrassing notebook aside for now――
あのさ。ひと言多くない？: Hey, don't you have a lot to say?
人の役に立って何が悪いって、主張してやれよ。\n打算でやってるってことまで、わざ:
Tell him what's wrong with being useful to others.
There's no need to go out of your way to tell people that you're doing it on a calculated basis, though.
泉花は何も間違っちゃいない。\nだから、今まで通り堂々と人助けしてればいい。:
Izumika hasn't made any mistakes.
That's why I just have to help people openly, like I've always done.
さらに翌日の放課後――: And the next day, after school――
昨日は勢いに任せてズケズケ言いすぎたかもな。\n知った風な口をきくなって思われて:
I might have gotten carried away and said too much yesterday.
I wouldn't be surprised if she thought I didn't want to talk to her like I knew her...
今日、顔を合わせたら、もう一度ちゃんと話を――: If we see each other today, I'll talk to her again――
でさ、その時私に手を差し伸べてくれたわけよ。\nクラスの子達も見てる前で、わざわ:
And that's when he reached out to me.
She went out of her way to do it in front of the kids in class.
うわ～、露骨。\nやっぱり点数稼ぎじゃん。:
Wow, so blatant.
I knew it. You're trying to score points.
裏のある善意なんて押しつけられてもね～。\nま、みんなの手前、お礼は一応言ってあ:
There's no need to force me to do anything good.
Well, I did thank her in front of everyone, but—
それって、帰省の費用を立て替えてあげた日のこと？\nあの時は、ずいぶん困った顔し:
Are you talking about the day you paid for your trip home?
You looked pretty troubled back then, didn't you?
い、いつから聞いてたの……！？: H-How long have you been listening?!
そうねー……\n昨日、あなた達があれこれ話してた時からかな。:
You're right...
Ever since you guys were talking about this and that yesterday.
そういえば、あなたのことも前に助けてあげたわよね。\n車道でお喋りしてて、不注意:
Come to think of it, I saved you before, didn't I?
We were chatting in the driveway, and I was about to get run over by a car due to carelessness...
うっ……あ、あの時は……どうも……: Ugh... A-At that time... Thank you...
気にしないで。\n感謝の言葉なら、助けた時にも聞いてるから。:
Don't worry about it.
If you're looking for words of gratitude, I heard them when I saved you.
よかったわ。悲しいことが起きなくて。\nご実家に帰れなかったり、大ケガをしてたら:
I'm glad nothing sad happened.
It'd be bad if you couldn't go home or get seriously injured.
そ、そうね……姫川さんには本当に感謝してるわ。: Y-You're right... I'm really grateful to Himekawa-san.
本当に？ あなた達の話を聞いた感じじゃ、\n余計なお世話だったみたいだけど。:
Really? From what you've told me,
Looks like I shouldn't have bothered.
じゃあ、私の人助けは余計なお世話じゃなかったのね？: So my help wasn't unnecessary, was it?
ポイント稼ぎだろうと、いい子ぶってる偽善者だろうと、\n誰も困ってないどころか、:
Whether it was to earn points or to be a hypocrite acting like a good girl, it didn't matter
Not only is no one in trouble, but you're being saved, aren't you?
誰かのためになることをしてるんだから、\n悪く言われる筋合いなんてないわよ、ね？:
You're doing something for someone else's sake,
There's no reason to be badmouthed, is there?
え？ 急に謝ったりして、どうしたの？\n私はただ、自分の行いについて話してるだけ:
Huh? Why are you apologizing all of a sudden?
I'm just talking about what I've done.
っ……わ、私達が悪かったわよ。\nその……陰口言ったりして、ごめん。:
...I-It's our fault.
Um... I'm sorry for badmouthing you behind your back.
わ、私も言い過ぎたわ。ただのやっかみだった。\n……本当に、ごめんなさい。:
I-I went too far. I was just jealous.
...I'm really sorry.
……もういいってば。\n私、謝られるより、お礼を言われる方が好きだし。:
...That's enough.
I like being thanked more than being apologized to.
ふふ、ちょっと付き合ってくれる？: Hehe, will you come with me for a bit?
ふふん♪ 全部言っちゃった。\nおかげでスッキリしたわ。:
Hehe♪ I said it all.
Thanks to you, I feel much better.
あれだけ言いたい放題言えばな。: If you say as much as you want.
%usernameusernameuserna%さんのせいだからね。\nあなたが:
It's your fault, %usernameusernameuserna%-san.
Don't forget that you gave me a push.
『せい』じゃ言い方が悪かったかしら。\n%usernameusernameuse:
I guess I shouldn't have said it like that.
It's all thanks to %usernameusernameuserna%-san.
%usernameusernameuserna%さんが私を肯定してくれたから、\:
Because %usernameusernameuserna%-san affirmed me,
I was able to openly declare in front of everyone that it wasn't a bad thing.
打算ありきの人助けも間違ったことじゃないって……\nそんなふうに言ってもらえるな:
Helping people who are calculating isn't a bad thing...
I didn't expect her to say that.
まあ、胸につかえていたものが取れたなら何よりだ。: Well, I'm glad I was able to get the thing off my chest.
いつかちゃんとお礼をしないとね。\n言葉だけじゃなくて、何か特別な……:
I'll have to thank him properly someday.
It's not just words, it's something special...
遠慮しとく。何かイヤな予感もするし。: I'll pass. I have a bad feeling about this.
あ～。なんか失礼な断り方。: Ah~. That's kind of a rude way to refuse.
警戒もするさ。\n優等生の皮を被ってた泉花の、思わぬ一面を知っちゃったからな。:
I'll be on guard.
After all, I'd learned an unexpected side of Izumika when she was wearing the skin of an honor student.
そう言わず、期待してるといいわ。\n何しろ私は『感謝されるプロ』だからね。:
Don't say that. Just look forward to it.
After all, I'm a pro who gets thanked.
『感謝されるプロ』の本気の感謝、見せてあげるから。: I'll show you how grateful I am to be a pro.
そこまで言うなら……じゃあ、楽しみにしてるよ。: If you insist... I'll look forward to it, then.
